articles.title: Round-table Talks Held with Teenagers Who Came Back to Embrace of DPRK
articles.content:
Round-table Talks Held with Teenagers Who Came Back to DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Teenagers who came back to the DPRK while being taken away to the south after being kidnapped by south Koreans had round-table talks at the Koryo Hall of Compatriots Thursday.
					 They were Ro Jong Yong (14), Ryu Chol Ryong, Jang Kuk Hwa and Ri Kwang Hyok (15), Jong Kwang Yong (16), Pak Kwang Hyok (17), Ryu Kwang Hyok (18), Mun Chol and Paek Yong Won (19).
					
					 They first talked about how they were being taken away to south Korea, after being taken in by the south Korean puppet group which hatched a sordid plot.
					
					 Mun Chol said Pak Kwang Hyok lived in the house of a south Korean clergy named Jang Ha Jin in Dandong, China for three years, Ryu Chol Ryong, Ri Kwang Hyok and Jong Kwang Yong for almost two years and himself, Ryu Kwang Hyok, Jang Kuk Hwa and Ro Jong Yong for one year and six months and Paek Yong Won for five months.
					
					 Mun Chol said that at the end of April, Jang Ha Jin, in the grip of uneasiness, told his wife, "I can not hold out in China any longer. Let's go to south Korea."
					
					 At 11:00 a.m. a van arrived but the couple only let the youngsters take it.
					
					 They had whole four-day travel being handed over from one man to another, Mun Chol said, adding:
					
					 After getting off the van we crossed a high mountain on foot.
					
					 Following a man who came to take us over, we dropped in at a small village to get only drinking water and we took another van.
					
					  After traveling by van for about 20 to 30 minutes we came to a stop to be met by Jang Ha Jin and his wife.
					
					 The last guide handed us over to Jang's couple who passed the guide a thick money envelope.
					
					 It was only at that time that we realized we illegally crossed the border of China. There we spent one night and the next morning we went to a bus-stop to take bus.
					
					 Mun Chol said he was so tired that he dozed off inside the bus, adding that when he was awakened from the sleep he found that the bus was held up, being intercepted at a checkpoint.
					
					 Ri Kwang Hyok said he heard later that the government of that country proved those on board to be abductees to south Korea by flesh traffickers and rendered help so that they could be sent back to Pyongyang.
					
					 The teenagers explained how they were made to live in Jang Ha Jin's house in Dandong, China.
					
					 Paek Yong Won said that he was kidnapped by Jang Ha Jin when he was walking along the road in Changbai region of China one day in December last year.
					
					 Pak Kwang Hyok, Mun Chol, Ryu Chol Ryong and other teenagers said that Jang and his wife shut them up in their house and inflicted heavy penalties on them for the mere reason that they did not memorize well the book of bible and hymn. They said that Jang and his wife beat them with baseball bat and umbrella, making them unable to walk or hear.
					
					 Paek Yong Won expressed his indignation, saying that clergyman Jang urged him to pray for the construction of a church on Mansu Hill.
					
					 Saying that he protested, Paek Yong Won continued that even though he left the homeland he could not forget the loving care shown by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who were always alive in their hearts.
					
					 When he wrote letters reading "General Kim Jong Il Lives Forever!" and "Long Live the Workers' Party of Korea!" in his notebook, the clergyman and his wife took off their shoes and beat him in the face, calling him "red" and "communist spy".
					
					 Mun Chol said that once he overheard clergyman Jang saying that he begged for charity from south Koreans after showing them photos of Paek Yong Won with his ears frozen and swollen to collect money.
					
					 Jong Kwang Yong said that he once saw clergyman Jang being criticized by a man from south Korea called "ring grandfather" who scolded Jang for using up without result all the money allotted for the collection of more children. Jong Kwang Yong added that Jang humbly begged pardon with his face ablush, explaining that he could not move for a good while with his collar being seized by Chinese police.
					
					 Pak Kwang Hyok disclosed that Jang used to have contact with old, dreadful-looking American lady who claimed to be the representative of the "Association for Freedom of North Korea", an organization in Washington, from whom he used to get separate fund.
					
					 Pak added that through the American woman Jang took to south Korea in September 2011 other teenagers called Mun Il Phyong, Sim Su Man and Kim Yong Min who stayed there before him and took to the U.S. in August 2012 Hyon Chon Ryong, Ri Mun Chol, Kim Pong Chol and Han Chol Jun.
					
					 Pak Kwang Hyok said that Jang tried to include him in the group of children who were taken to the U.S. in August 2012. Jang promised to send him to the U.S. later because he did not get an approval from the old lady.
					
					 Those teenagers expressed their impressions of returning to the homeland, free from the plot of abduction by the puppet group of south Korea.
					
					 Ri Kwang Hyok said that he saw a TV footage of the 7th Congress of the Korean Children's Union after return home. He added that he felt tears welling up when he saw the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un coming to the tribune of honor, letting children of his age be seated next to him, calling a student of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School close to him and talking to him, while fondling his cheek. 
					
					 Mun Chol said that Kim Jong Un is like the bright sun embracing all of them and opening up a bright future for them.
					
					 The returnees sang song "Ardent Desire" feeling thankful for Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK Farmers, Women Swear to Take Revenge on U.S.
articles.content:
DPRK Farmers, Women Swear to Take Revenge on U.S. 
Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers and members of the women's union held meetings at the Sinchon Museum in South Hwanghae Province and the Susan-ri House of Class Education in Kangso District, Nampho City on June 20 to swear to take revenge on the U.S. with the approach of June 25, the day of struggle against the U.S. imperialists.
					 Reports and speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 They said that the U.S. imperialists ignited a war on June 25, 1950 to invade the young DPRK, barbarously blew up everything on the land and killed innocent people in cold blood in every part of the country.
					
					 During the days when the Korean People’s Army was in temporary strategic retreat, the U.S. imperialists killed over 35,000 innocent people in Sinchon, a quarter of the population of the county.
					
					 They also killed more than 1,000 innocent people in Susan-ri, Kangso County, one third of the population of the sub-county, during over 40 days of occupation of the county.
					
					 The reporters and speakers said that the armed forces and the people of the DPRK demonstrated the matchless bravery and popular heroism to beat back the aggressors and honorably defended the country.
					
					 They condemned the U.S. imperialists for still working desperately to attain their ambition to invade the DPRK, far from drawing a lesson from their bitter defeat in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists again unleash a war against the DPRK, the agricultural workers and the members of the women's union will wipe out the aggressors to the last man and give full vent to the long pent-up grudge, they added.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams S. Korean Regime for Justifying War Provoked by Outsiders
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams S. Korean Regime for Justifying War Provoked by Outsiders
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces are working hard to twist historical facts that the U.S. ignited the war against the DPRK in 1950.
					 Park Geun Hye at a meeting of senior secretaries of Chongwadae on June 17 expressed regret at the results of the opinion poll conducted among youngsters over their understanding of history which showed that about 70 percent of the respondents answered the June 25 war was invasion against the north. She instructed the new “government” to put the situation under control without fail as it is a matter which should never be overlooked.
					
					 What she uttered is one more act of treachery to cover up the true colors of the U.S. as a provocateur of the Korean war recorded in history and justify its invasion to reduce the Korean people to slaves. 
					
					 This is a mean act of passing the buck for the U.S. ignition of the June 25 war to the fellow countrymen in a bid to conceal the treacherous acts the puppet forces perpetrated by leveling guns at compatriots as a shock brigade in carrying out the war policy of foreign forces and justify their dependence on outsiders.
					
					 Historical facts prove that the Korean war in the 1950s was foreign forces' war of aggression against the DPRK, to all intents and purposes.
					
					 McArthur sent a message to Japanese Prime Minister Yoshida on June 26, 1950 in which he issued an order to suspend the publication of Akahata, organ of the Japanese Communist Party, for 30 days from June 27.
					
					 The then newspaper reported that McArthur issued such order because it carried the news that the Syngman Rhee puppet army illegally invaded the area north of the 38 parallel in Korea.
					
					 Zhou Enlai, the then premier and minister of Foreign Affairs of the Central People's Government of China, on June 28, 1950 stated as follows as regards Truman's statement on June 27:
					
					 "In actuality, the Syngman Rhee puppet government's attack on the DPRK by the agitation of the U.S. government was kicked off by the U.S. for the purpose of securing a pretext for invading Korea, Vietnam and other countries.
					
					 This is another interference of the U.S. imperialists in Asian issues."
					
					 The international political situation and the balance of forces in the international affairs at that time were completely unfavorable for carrying out the U.S. strategy for dominating the world.
					
					 In the international arena, the influence of the socialist countries steadily increased and the anti-imperialist national liberation struggle gained further momentum in many countries which were under the domination and control of the imperialists.
					
					 In the meantime, the U.S. military industry complex and the financial situation in Wall Street badly required wars of aggression.
					
					 The U.S. began to sink in economic depression from 1946 after it greeted heyday by gaining huge profits through mass production and sale of arms during the Second World War.
					
					 At a time when arms expansion unprecedented in the history of America started and the fear of economic depression reached an extreme phase, the U.S. political and military authorities decided to start the Korean War as a way out.
					
					 The option made by the U.S. put spurs to the revival of Japan.
					
					 The U.S. investment in Japan early in 1950 totaled 2.5 billion U.S. dollars.
					
					 The U.S. war provocateurs planned to use Japan as a military strategic springboard in the Far East. The ruling quarters of Japan had the hope of using the Korean war for implementing their plans to take revenge.
					
					 A correspondent of the Swiss paper Neue Zurcher Zeitung dispatched the following report from the Far East five days before the U.S. started its provocation to the DPRK:
					
					 There are many people in south Korea who seek the settlement of economic difficulties through the invasion of north Korea. 100,000 troops who were well trained by Americans and 50 000 policemen surely outnumber the north Korean forces.
					
					 The above-said facts are just the tip of the iceberg of the disclosed facts about the aim sought by the U.S in igniting the war.
					
					 History never changes no matter how hard one may try to alter it.
					
					 The perpetrators of the crimes will surely be forced to pay for them one day.

articles.title: Turf Research Center Opens
articles.content:
Turf Research Center Opens
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The Turf Research Center has been built under the State Academy of Sciences at the initiative of the dear respected Kim Jong Un and under his energetic guidance.
					 It has several laboratories, a building with rooms for analysis and experimental rooms, greenhouse for scientific research and experimental plots.
					
					 A opening ceremony of the center took place on Thursday.
					
					 Present there were Choe Thae Bok, officials concerned, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and officials and employees of the center.
					
					 Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, made an address to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers underlined the need to bear deep in mind the importance of researches into turf and dynamically conduct scientific researches and thus work hard to produce more species of ever-green turf suited to the climatic and topographic conditions of the country.

articles.title: Minju Joson Flays S. Korean Authorities for Abducting People of DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Flays S. Korean Authorities for Abducting People of DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- It was recently disclosed that the south Korean puppet regime instructed its secret agents and human traffickers to lock away a dozen of DPRK citizens in the south Korean embassy in a foreign country to take them to south Korea.
					 Minju Joson in a bylined commentary observes in this regard on Thursday:
					
					 This human rights abuses against DPRK citizens amount to a total denial of its dignity and social system and an open challenge to it.
					
					 Such actions are a product of plots to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 What matters is that such actions as luring and abducting citizens of the DPRK are being carried out at Chongwadae's instructions in an organized way.
					
					 As media put, Park Geun Hye, expressing regret over the failed operation for luring and abducting young people of the DPRK, personally instructed those concerned with the matter to use the south Korean embassy for holding DPRK citizens. She also checked the whole process from the beginning to the last in a "crisis management room" in the underground air raid shelter of Chongwadae.
					
					 The south Korean present ruling quarters are following in the footsteps of the Lee Myung Bak regime which came under bitter fire by the nation for its act of escalating confrontation with the DPRK during its tenure.
					
					 The present regime should stop at once such actions of luring and abducting citizens of the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK Wrestlers Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Wrestlers Back Home
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK players came back home on Thursday after participating in the 2013 Asian Youth Wrestling Championship.
					 They won two gold medals, three silvers and one bronze in the championship.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Flies Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Flies Back Home
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Olympic Committee led by Ri Jong Mu, minister of Physical Culture and Sports and chairman of the committee, came back home on Thursday. It participated in the extraordinary general assembly of the Association of National Olympic Committees held in Lausanne, Switzerland.

articles.title: Film Show Held by Ministry of People's Armed Forces
articles.content:
Film Show Held by Ministry of People's Armed Forces
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of the People's Armed Forces held a film show in honor of the military attaches corps here on Thursday with the approach of the June 25-July 27 month of the anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Present there on invitation were members of the military attaches corps.
					
					 On hand were officers of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The participants watched the Korean documentary film "Provocateur of the Korean War" dealing with the facts that the U.S. imperialists launched an armed invasion of the DPRK by instigating traitor Syngman Rhee with an ulterior intention to turn the whole of Korea into their colony but suffered a shameful defeat in the war.

articles.title: Foreign Tourists Admire at Scenic Mt. Kumgang in Korea
articles.content:
Foreign Tourists Admire at Scenic Mt. Kumgang in Korea
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The 2nd batch of Rason-Mt. Kumgang international tourism by the ship Royale Star did sightseeing in Mt. Kumgang some days ago.
					 The batch consisted of Chinese people.
					
					 They were fascinated by the amazing scenery of the world's famous Mt. Kumgang boasting of myriads of fantastic cliffs.
					
					 Cui Longzhe from Yanji City, Jilin Province of China told KCNA:
					
					 "Last year I toured Mt. Chilbo with my friends. Its scenery was very impressive for me.
					
					 Today I went round the area of Kuryong Pool in Mt. Kumgang. Its scenery is as beautiful and fantastic as that of Mt. Chilbo. Mt. Kumgang is majestic and its water is very crystal.
					
					 What I also enjoyed very much here is bathing in hot spring."
					
					 Gao Guiqing, a medical worker of Yanji City, said:
					
					 "I really enjoyed myself with mountaineering. All tourists are satisfied with the clean environment and service here.
					
					  Employees of this resort are very kind. I want to tour Mt. Kumgang again. Also impressive here is spectacular forest of pine trees. I like it very much."
					
					 Wang Zhaowei from Yanji City said:
					
					 "Mt. Kumgang attracts people with its natural beauty. I want to enjoy its scenery again.
					
					 I hope that through tourism the China-DPRK friendship will be boosted."

articles.title: Staff Members of Russian, Malaysian Embassies Do Friendly Work
articles.content:
Staff Members of Russian, Malaysian Embassies Do Friendly Work
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy did friendly work at the DPRK-Russia Friendship Kochang Co-op Farm in Chollima District, Nampho City on Thursday.
					 They appreciated an art performance given by kindergarteners.
					
					 The Russian ambassador said that he saw the farmers making innovations in agricultural production, true to the Workers' Party of Korea's line.
					
					 He wished the farmers bigger success in the future.
					
					 On the same day Ilham Tuah Bin Illias, charge d' affaires ad interim, and staff members of the Malaysian embassy here visited the DPRK-Malaysia Friendship Ponghwa Co-op Farm in Kangdong County.
					
					 They looked round the room for the education in the revolutionary history before joining farmers weeding cotton field.
					
					 The charge d' affaires ad interim said that he hoped farmers would take the lead in increasing the agricultural production, true to the noble intention of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 During a break, the guests watched an art performance given by farmers. 
					
					 Members of the Russian and Malaysian embassies handed aid materials to the farms.

articles.title: WPK Turned into Motherly Party by Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
WPK Turned into Motherly Party by Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- General secretary Kim Jong Il in his lifetime had worked hard to develop the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) into a motherly party faithfully serving the people.
					 He set it as the starting point of party activity to serve the popular masses when he began his work at the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 He always said that the WPK should bear responsibility for the popular masses' destiny and take good care of it as a mother does for her child.
					
					 With absolute trust, he rallied all the servicepersons and civilians around the WPK, bringing about epoch-making changes in the revolution and construction.
					
					 He set forth such slogans based on love for the people as "Let us build new society with trust and love!" and "We serve the people!"
					
					 Early in March Juche 95 (2006) when visiting the Samsu Power Station under construction, he took a state measure to build dwelling houses for the inhabitants residing in the area possibly to be flooded due to the construction, stressing that it is the WPK's policy and mass line to take care of the people's life.
					
					 One day when an official in charge of a province failed to provide labor conditions for workers, Kim Jong Il called a meeting of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee over this matter, seeing to it that officials concerned apologized to the workers.
					
					 When a girl residing in the west coastal area was drifting on a piece of ice in the sea, Kim Jong Il took a nationwide measure to rescue her. 
					
					 His warm love made the people harden their firm will to share destiny with their leader and devotedly work to carry the WPK's plans into practice.
					
					 The WPK is now creditably discharging its mission and duty as motherly party under the guidance of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un carrying forward Kim Jong Il's noble intention.

articles.title: Changgol Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Changgol Revolutionary Site
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- There is the Changgol Revolutionary Site in Changsong County, North Phyongan Province of the DPRK.
					 President Kim Il Sung stayed there during the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953).
					
					 In October Juche 39 (1950) he presided over an important meeting of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Korean People's Army (KPA) at the site, guiding the work to bring about a radical turn throughout the country.
					
					 At the site there is a house where the President called a Political Committee meeting of the C.C., WPK on November 2-3, 1950. At the meeting he advanced important tasks for strengthening the Party on the basis of scientific analysis of the prevailing military and political situation.
					
					 He also met a leading official of Changsong County several times, instructing him to develop the county in political and economic aspects.
					
					 He gave the KPA an order to launch a general counteroffensive against the U.S. imperialist aggressors and set forth the detailed tasks to this end in a house of the site where the KPA General Staff was situated.
					
					 The site has a house in which the President convened a meeting of the KPA Supreme Command to make a historic speech "Let Us Be Fully Prepared for a New Counteroffensive" on October 30, 1950.
					
					 At the site there are also an air-raid shelter and a well used by the President in the period.
					
					 On June 13 supreme leader Kim Jong Un visited this revolutionary site and called for preserving it on a permanent basis to educate the servicepersons and civilians in the immortal exploits and noble personality of President Kim Il Sung, who led the Fatherland Liberation War to victory.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Slammed for Distorting History
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Slammed for Distorting History
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- According to south Korean CBS on Wednesday, the Teachers Union condemned the south Korean chief executive for criticizing students' understanding of history.
					 A recent opinion poll conducted among over 500 students of high schools across south Korea said that about 70 percent of respondents answered the June 25 war was a war for invading the north.
					
					 As regards this opinion poll, Park Geun Hye told senior secretaries of Chongwadae on June 17 that it was a serious problem indicative of the wrong education in history and such things as distorting truth and history should not be allowed to happen.
					
					 She instructed the new "government" to bring the situation under control as such a thing should never be overlooked.
					
					 In this connection, the union termed the criticism made by the chief executive of teachers for tampering with history a rash behavior prompted by her misunderstanding of the situation.

articles.title: Revolutionary Sites Draw Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Revolutionary Sites Draw Endless Stream of Visitors
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army, people from all walks of life and school youth and children are visiting in an endless stream the Kosanjin, Yonphung and Hyangha revolutionary sites in Jagang Province with the approach of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The Kosanjin Revolutionary Site is associated with the undying feats President Kim Il Sung performed in laying down the operational line on counterattack and leading the struggle for carrying it out while staying in Kosanjin from early November to mid December in Juche 39 (1950).
					
					 The Yonphung Revolutionary Site tells about the historical facts that the President guided the 30th Plenary Meeting of the Cabinet in December 1950 and aroused the entire party and all people to the victory in the war, while preparing the 3rd Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The Hyangha Revolutionary Site is the place where the President convened the 3rd Plenary Meeting of the WPK Central Committee and took a decisive measure for the final victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Justifying Its Human Rights Abuses: News Analyst
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Justifying Its Human Rights Abuses: News Analyst 
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. National Security Agency's wanton violation of rights of Americans was disclosed to spark off criticism not only in the U.S. but the rest of the world.
					 Edward Snowden, former staff member of the U.S. National Security Agency, through the British Guardian on June 6, disclosed that the agency perpetrated such serious human rights abuses as massively gathering information by tapping phone messages and internet usage of Americans.
					
					 He produced a directive issued by a U.S. court as evidence. It called for collecting all information about phone calls inside the U.S. and between it and other countries and provide it to the U.S. National Security Council on a daily basis.
					
					 Pursuant to this directive, contents of e-mails and phone calls made by millions of Americans have reportedly been gathered by the agency until now since April last.
					
					 Earlier, the Chinese Xinhua News said the agency gathered 1.7 billion information pieces about phone callers and netizens every day and among them are even information about family secrets.
					
					 This is clear evidence showing the true colors of the U.S. as a criminal state where human rights abuses are organized and legitimatized.
					
					 When recalling that U.S. Congress adopted a law on allowing the government to gather information about private matters of people through wiretapping and electronic communication media from long ago, such crimes committed by the agency pursuant to the directive of the said court is nothing surprising.
					
					 The U.S. Department of Justice secretly gathered phone calls made by AP and the tax authorities investigated and monitored some suspected persons by the same method. There are too many instances of disclosure of tapping of private messages in the U.S.
					
					 What is surprising is the attitude taken by the high-ranking U.S. officials towards the state-sponsored human rights abuses.
					
					 On June 7 U.S. President Obama, when interviewed by reporters as regards what the U.S. National Security Agency has done, unblushingly answered that the agency's actions were approved by U.S. Congress and it contributes to combating terrorism.
					
					 A senior official of the agency blustered gathering of phone messages serves as an important means to protect the country from the threat of the terrorists.
					
					 This clearly indicates the brazen-faced nature of the U.S., which openly justifies the human rights abuses perpetrated under the signboard of "anti-terror" as its policy.
					
					 The world people have already branded the "war on terrorism" of the U.S. as an unpardonable crime against humanity as it has mercilessly encroached upon the sovereignty of other countries and nations in a bid to protect the security and interests of the privileged who account for just one percent of the population.
					
					 What the U.S. dignitaries uttered is no more than a declaration that it may encroach upon the independent rights of the popular masses if it is for the sake of the interests and security of the privileged.
					
					 This is the real picture of the U.S.

articles.title: S. Headquarters of Pomminryon Calls for Opening New Phase of Independent Reunification
articles.content:
S. Headquarters of Pomminryon Calls for Opening New Phase of Independent Reunification
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) issued a statement titled "Let's open new phase of independent reunification under uplifted banner of 'By our nation itself'" on Saturday, the 13th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 13 years have passed since the south-north summit, the first of its kind in the history of division, and the publication of the historic June 15 joint declaration in which the south and the north promised to reunify the country independently by concerted efforts of the Korean nation, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The publication of the joint declaration resulted in bringing about remarkable events such as ushering in a new era when Koreans advance hand in hand along the road of reunification, opening sky, land and sea routes between the south and the north and making contact, cooperation and exchange brisk.
					
					 The south-north relations which had made progress toward the new era of national reconciliation, unity, reunification and prosperity were ruthlessly severed due to the Lee Myung Bak regime's policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 In order to open a new phase of dialogue, the present regime should roll back the policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen and clarify the stand of respecting and implementing the south-north joint declarations.
					
					 If the Koreans pool their efforts, they can certainly achieve independence, peace, reunification and common prosperity, the statement noted, calling upon all Koreans to put an end to the era of war and division through their concerted efforts.

articles.title: S. Korean Intelligence Service's Arrogant Actions under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Intelligence Service's Arrogant Actions under Fire 
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Arrogant actions of the Intelligence Service (IS) were disclosed in south Korea, stunning people, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 A document was opened to public recently to prove that the IS was involved in the criminal actions perpetrated by the Lee Myung Bak regime, which politically suppressed people of various circles including the students who struggled for getting the registration fee halved, branding them as "leftist forces" and "forces following the north".
					
					 Enraged by this, members of the Federation of University Students and the students committee of the opposition Unified Progressive Party held a press conference outside the building of the IS on May 22, denouncing its illegal actions.
					
					 Displeased with the action, the IS filed a complaint with the police against the chairpersons of the students committee and the federation, charging that they "held a rally without any prior notice".
					
					 The members of the federation and the students committee termed such arrogant action of the IS ridiculous as it described a normal press conference as a "rally".
					
					 Recalling that public is becoming increasingly indignant at the IS's interference in politics and people are growing vocal demanding the punishment of criminals, they accused the IS of shutting its eyes to this fact but getting more reckless, far from making apology for its illegal actions.
					
					 The IS going reckless, unafraid of popular masses, will never be able to escape punishment, they warned.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive Should Be Held Accountable for IS Crimes
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive Should Be Held Accountable for IS Crimes 
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea, in an editorial on Monday said the puppet government should be held responsible for intelligence-related conspiratorial acts.
					 It was disclosed that Won Se Hun, former director of the Intelligence Service (IS), and Kim Yong Phan, former director of the Seoul District Police Agency, were involved in the IS's criminal interference in politics, the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 Won Se Hun had openly interfered in each election, labeling progressive and democratic forces including opposition parties, civic organizations and trade unions opposed to the misrule of the "government" as "leftist forces following the north," since right after he took office in February 2009.
					
					 Kim Yong Phan pressurized his staff to make public intermediary investigation results peppered with lies and fabrications after destroying the evidence proving the crimes committed by a female staff member of the IS.
					
					 Under the political pressure behind the scene, the prosecution did not issue even a warrant of arrest for criminals but it fired and indicted only the staff member of the IS who complained about suspected crime.
					
					 No one would believe that the director of the IS interfered in politics and election unilaterally without the chief executive's  instruction and the director of the police agency fabricated the false investigation results by himself without any agreement with the ruling quarters.
					
					 The present chief executive should own responsibility for groundless smear campaign through the intelligence organ, the editorial held.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Russia, Norway and Denmark on June 13 to mark the 49th anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Zelenov, first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, said that the WPK has demonstrated its dignity to the world as the Party of President Kim Il Sung by the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, praising his immortal party building exploits.
					
					 Dag Norum, chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway, noted that Kim Jong Il wisely led the WPK for nearly half a century, strengthening it into an invincible revolutionary party.
					
					 Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, stated in detail that the WPK has grown stronger into a party supported by broad popular masses.
					
					 Messages of greeting to the dear respected Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings held in Norway and Denmark.

articles.title: Chinese, Uruguayan Media Praise Kim Jong Il's Exploits
articles.content:
Chinese, Uruguayan Media Praise Kim Jong Il's Exploits
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The Chinese Hong Kong magazine International Link and the Uruguayan newspaper La Juventud carried special write-ups to mark the 49th anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The June issue of the Chinese Hong Kong magazine carried several articles with photos of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 It said that Kim Jong Il while working at the C.C., the WPK developed and enriched the Juche idea and gave clear-cut answers to the theoretical and practical problems arising in the revolution and construction with his energetic ideo-theoretical activities. 
					
					 The distinguished exploits he performed in leading the WPK for decades serve as the eternal motive force fully encouraging the socialist cause of the Korean people, it said, and went on:
					
					 The WPK's new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force reflects the demand of the prevailing situation. 
					
					 It is the natural and wise option for the DPRK to decide to continuously bolster up the nuclear force in quality and quantity and it is in recognition of the situation of the country aiming at building a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 The Uruguayan paper La Juventud on June 11 carried an article with his photo. The article said while leading the WPK he laid the eternal foundation of socialist Korea and left great exploits guaranteeing its rosy future as heritage. 
					
					 With warm love for the country and people he turned the DPRK into a world-level military power and invincible socialist fortress, the article added.

articles.title: Russian Paper Praises Kim Jong Un's Exploits
articles.content:
Russian Paper Praises Kim Jong Un's Exploits 
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The Russian newspaper Patriot No. 21 carried an article "Warmly loving people" with photos of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 The world media broadcast almost all the news of his revolutionary activities, the article said, and went on:
					
					 His field guidance is of special importance for the DPRK, which is defending socialism at a grim time when the imperialist allied forces persist in war moves. 
					
					 In the way of his field guidance he takes deep care of the life of soldiers and people down to details. 
					
					 That is why he always feels being pressed for time.
					
					 He takes a short and uncomfortable nap and the rest is unthinkable for him. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il worked like this. 
					
					 In a word, when the leader warmly loves the people, the people would firmly believe in him and entirely entrust their destiny to him. 
					
					 The Korean people unhesitatingly devote their lives to the collective and comrades as they are led by the leader, who devotedly works for the people's welfare and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: U.S. Is Hurdle to Denuclearization of Korea: Brazilian
articles.content:
U.S. Is Hurdle to Denuclearization of Korea: Brazilian
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, made public a statement titled "U.S., hurdle to denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula, is disturbing dialogue and peace by deception" on June 7. 
					 He said the U.S. is making a mockery of the world public while making it appear to be interested in the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 This deception is aimed not to take blame for the tensions worsening on the peninsula, he said, and went on:
					
					 The world media are now blaming the U.S., being deeply concerned about the situation of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is the U.S. sinister intention behind its cry for denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula to force the DPRK to disarm itself and realize the ambition for aggression of the DPRK at any cost. 
					
					 The DPRK wishes for a real dialogue with the U.S. and its stand is to replace the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty and continue to bolster the nuclear deterrence unless the U.S. nuclear threat is removed.

articles.title: DPRK's Significant Day Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Significant Day Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries in the period from June 7 to 13 to mark the 13th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 They included a seminar by the Indian Intellectuals' Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, lectures in Guinea and round-table talks in Ethiopia.
					
					 The chairman of the Indian Intellectuals' Society for the Study of the Juche Idea said as follows:
					
					 The adoption of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration was the greatest exploit by general secretary Kim Jong Il in the cause of national reunification.
					
					 The preservation and implementation of the declaration will help accelerate Korea's reunification.
					
					 Korea's reunification will be surely realized as the dear respected Kim Jong Un is carrying forward the intention of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The dean of the art faculty of the Dubreka Art College of Guinea referred to the validity and vitality of the June 15 joint declaration the basic idea of which is "By our nation itself", adding:
					
					 Today the Korean nation is making nation-wide push to bring about a new era of reunification and prosperity by thoroughly maintaining and implementing the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The world public wholeheartedly hopes that the Korean nation will reunify the country as soon as possible under the banner of the joint declaration and reliably ensure the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea posted an article on its website on June 13 to mark the 49th anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The article said that he started his work at the C.C., WPK on June 19, 1964, an event of great significance in accomplishing the cause of Juche and Songun revolution. The article went on:
					
					 He devoted his all to glorifying the feats performed by Kim Il Sung, the founder of the WPK and the eternal President of the DPRK, in Juche-based party building.
					
					 He made public a lot of celebrated works with his outstanding ideological and theoretical wisdom and insight.
					
					 The President's revolutionary cause of Juche had been firmly carried forward under Kim Jong Il's wise leadership.
					
					 The WPK advanced along the road of great victory and prosperity and made great achievements under his leadership.
					
					 He kept the idea of believing in the people as in Heaven as a motto, led the WPK to play its role as mother party and pursued the benevolent politics.
					
					 His exploits are being successfully carried forward by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita invernadero de verduras de Granja Cooperativa de Songhak
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita invernadero de verduras de Granja Cooperativa de Songhak
 Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio el invernadero de verduras de la Granja Cooperativa de Songhak de la ciudad de Anju de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur.
					 Pasando revista a varios edificios del invernadero, hizo conocimiento del estado de construccion y produccion.
					
					 Pregunto cuales son las variedades de vegetales que se cultivan ahora y como aseguran la calefaccion en invierno y la ventilacion en verano asi como el volumen de produccion anual.
					
					 Es loable que esta granja haya construido por cuenta propia este invernadero de alta productividad y suministrara a los granjeros las verduras de varios tipos cultivadas en el, dijo.
					
					 Senalo que le gusta mucho que el invernadero haya sido construido con materiales locales conforme a las condiciones del campo y encomendo que lo administraran bien para que los campesinos tengan beneficios reales.
					
					 Instruyo levantar por doquier los invernaderos de verduras y operarlos bien y agrego que eso tiene gran importancia en superar las limitaciones estacionales y suministrar vegetales frescos a los habitantes en todas las estaciones del ano.
					
					 Destaco que el centro debe enviar a las provincias, ciudades y distritos el diseno estandarizado de invernadero y hay que organizar la emulacion entre las provincias, ciudades y distritos y balancear esta labor.
					
					 El invernadero de verduras debe aumentar la cantidad de cosechas en el area determinada, senalo y agrego que deben construir el invernadero conforme a las condiciones climaticas y topograficas de las localidades y garantizar el caracter cientifico-tecnico en la produccion.
					
					 En el cultivo en invernadero, hay que asegurar la temperatura, la humedad, la insolacion, la tierra y otras condiciones conforme a las caracteristicas de cultivos y distribuir las variedades segun sus atributos biologicos para obtener alto rendimiento.
					
					 El Instituto de Verduras de Pyongyang debe divulgar a todos los invernaderos la instruccion cientifica y tecnica y estos tienen que cultivar las verduras de modo cientifico, dijo.
					
					 Para cosechar verduras varias veces al ano, es necesario echar suficientemente el abono organico y el quimico, indico y remarco que se debe establecer el sistema de distribucion de agroquimicos, abonos y semillas por el Estado.
					
					 Apunto que cuando el Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung produzca mucha cantidad de capas de vinilo, no habra problemas en la construccion de invernaderos.
					
					 Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que todos los sectores y unidades contribuiran a materializar la orientacion del partido para abundar la vida alimentaria de los habitantes, teniendo presente que la construccion de invernadero es una labor muy importante.
					
					 Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, Pak Thae Song y el secretario del comite del PTC en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Sur, Kim Yong Nam.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung
 Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung.
					 Primero el Mariscal vio el proceso de la produccion de triple membrana funcional para invernadero construido nuevamente en el taller de polietileno de alta presion tras escuchar la explicacion ante el diagrama de proceso de produccion.
					
					 Se mostro muy satisfecho de que los obreros del complejo hayan construido el moderno proceso capaz de producir en gran cantidad la triple membrana funcional de 0.06-0.12mm de grosor y 8-12m de ancho.
					
					 Dijo que deben acumular muchas experiencias y hacer con responsabilidad la administracion de equipos porque se produce por primera vez la triple membrana funcional, normalizar la produccion y elevar la calidad intensificando continuamente la capacitacion tecnica y funcional de los obreros.
					
					 Dando vuelta al taller de expedicion de abonos se entero de la produccion de abonos.
					
					 Al ver el abono amontonado senalo que parece ver el monton de arroz y subrayo que este complejo, que envia al sector agricola el abono, es igual que la fabrica de armas del frente agricola socialista.
					
					 En el proceso de embalaje de abono producido por la gasificacion de carbon se mostro muy satisfecho diciendo que esta es la fabrica firme en la independencia y el espiritu Juche que produce el abono con el carbon domestico.
					
					 Se cercioro de los asuntos que se presentan en  aumentar la produccion de abono y los resolvio.
					
					 Al recorrer el corral y el Complejo de Servicios de Higiene Chongchun se entero detalladamente de la labor de abastecimiento y la vida cultural de los obreros.
					
					 Evaluo que el complejo contribuye grandemente a la mejora de la vida alimentaria de los obreros criando muchos ganados.
					
					 Estimo altamente al secretario responsable del comite del PTC en el complejo Jon Kyong Son quien hace bien la labor de intendencia y se fotografio junto con el.
					
					 Se mostro muy alegre en el Complejo de Servicios de Higiene Chongchun de que el complejo haya ofrecido a los obreros las suficientes condiciones culturales y de descanso.
					
					 El Mariscal presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan ante el complejo. 
					
					 Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, Pak Thae Song y el secretario del comite del PTC en la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur Kim Yong Nam.

articles.title: Sostenida mesa redonda con jovenes y ninos secuestrados por titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
Sostenida mesa redonda con jovenes y ninos secuestrados por titeres surcoreanos
 Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 20 en la capitalina Casa de Compatriotas Coryo una mesa redonda con los jovenes y los ninos quienes repatriaron en medio de llevarse hacia el Sur de Corea seducidos y secuestrados por la banda de los titeres  surcoreanos.
					 Participaron en la ocasion Ro Jong Yong (14 anos de edad), Ryu Chol Ryong, Jang Kuk Hwa, Ri Kwang Hyok (15 anos de edad), Jong Kwang Yong (16 anos de edad), Pak Kwang Hyok (17 anos de edad), Ryu Kwang Hyok (18 anos de edad) y Mun Chol y Paek Yong Won (19 anos de edad).
					
					 Los participantes dijeron primero acerca del trayecto de llevarse secuestrados al Sur de Corea por las maniobras intrigantes de la banda titere.
					
					 Mun Chol recordo que en la casa del pastor surcoreano Jang Ha Jin en Dandong de China, Pak Kwang Hyok vivia durante 3 anos, Ryu Chol Ryong, Ri Kwang Hyok y Jong Kwang Yong, casi 2 anos, el mismo, Ryu Kwang Hyok, Jang Kuk Hwa y Ro Jong Yong, un ano y medio y Paek Yong Won, 5 meses y continuo:
					
					 A fines de abril pasado, Jang Ha Jin, muy inquieto, dijo a su esposa que "no podemos vivir mas en China e iremos al Sur de Corea".
					
					 A las once, vino un camion pequeno de carga en que nos hicieron montar.
					
					 Fuimos trasladandonos uno a otro y nos llevaron durante 4 dias en el camion.
					
					 Despues de bajar, crucemos a pie un monte.
					
					 Siguiendo a un hombre que vino para recibirnos, llegamos a una aldea pequena donde bebimos solo el agua y tomamos el otro camion de carga.
					
					 El camion paro al cabo de 20-30 minutos y alli nos recibieron los esposos del pastor Jang.
					
					 El ultimo conductor nos entrego a los esposos Jang quienes dieron al primero el sobre voluminoso de dinero.
					
					 Aquel momento, supimos que cruzamos ilegalmente la frontera china.
					
					 Alli, pasamos una noche y por la manana del dia siguiente, fuimos a la parada de omnibus.
					
					 Yo dormi muy fatigado en omnibus y cuando me desperte, el transporte mantuvo parado por la inspeccion.
					
					 Ri Kwang Hyok dijo que el gobierno de aquel pais, tras identificar que eramos secuestrados por los traficantes de seres humanos del Sur de Corea, nos ofrecio una ayuda activa para que nos regresaramos a Pyongyang.
					
					 Los participantes mencionaron el motivo de haber convivido juntos en la casa de Jang Ha Jin.
					
					 Paek Yong Won dijo que un dia de diciembre del ano pasado cuando estaba en la zona de Changbai de China, fue raptado de modo forzoso por Jang cuando iba a pie por la carretera.
					
					 Pak Kwang Hyok, Mun Chol, Ryu Chol Ryong y otros recordaron que los matrimonios de Jang les encarcelaron en su casa y les impusieron memorizar la Biblia y el cantico y revelaron que si no los hicimos bien, les dieron un tremendo castigo y golpe con el bate o con el baston de paraguas, asi que ellos se hicieron cojos o sordos.
					
					 Paek Yong Won expuso su indignacion por el hecho de que el pastor Jang le forzo orar para edificar en la colina Mansu una iglesia y continuo:
					
					 Pero, yo lo negue porque aunque abandone la patria, no pude olvidar el amor de los Generalisimos ni sus imagenes con amplia sonrisa guardados en mi corazon.
					
					 Por eso, escribi en el libro "!el Dirigente Kim Jong Il siempre esta vivo!" y "!Viva el Partido del Trabajo de Corea!"
					
					 Entonces, los conyuges del pastor me golpearon con los zapatos mi cara calificandome como "rojo" y "espia comunista".
					
					 Mun Chol recordo que una vez, escucho a escondidas las palabras de Jang quien dijo haber ganado dineros al cabo de peticion con lagrimas mostrandoles a otras personas la foto de Paek Yong Won quien padecia de sabanon.
					
					 Jong Kwang Yong recordo que un hombre llamado como "abuelo de anillo" proveniente del Sur de Corea pesquiso como gasto el dineros enviado anteriormente para secuestrar mas a ninos y Jang con cara enrojada respondio que no podia hacer nada por las autoridades de seguridad publica de China.
					
					 Pak Kwang Hyok dijo que el pastor se reunio a menudo con una mujer estadounidense llamada como delegada de "Alianza por la Libertad del Norte de Corea" quien le dio tambien el dinero y continuo:
					
					 Jang, a traves de esa mujer estadounidense, llevo en septiembre de 2011 al Sur de Corea a Mun Il Phyong, Sim Su Man y Kim Yong Min quienes vinieron antes que nosotros y en agosto de 2012, a Estados Unidos a Hyon Chon Ryong, Ri Mun Chol, Kim Pong Chol, Han Chol Jun y otros.
					
					 El pastor intento incluirme entre los ninos que se llevaban en agosto de 2012, pero, la norteamericana no lo acepto.
					
					 Los participantes dijeron sus impresiones de repatriacion liberados de la intriga de la banda titere,
					
					 Ri Kwang Hyok dijo que en TV vio la escena del VII Congreso de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea y agrego que lloro al ver al Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien en la tribuna hace sentarse a su lado a los ninos iguales a si mismos y acariciaba a un hijo de la escuela revolucionaria de Mangyongdae halandole algo.
					
					 Mun Chol subrayo que el regazo del Mariscal es igual que el sol afectuoso.
					
					 Los participantes cantaron la cancion "Gran deseo" dandole agradecimiento.

articles.title: ACNC denuncia actitud del Sur de Corea para justificar la pasada guerra coreana
articles.content:
ACNC denuncia actitud del Sur de Corea para justificar la pasada guerra coreana
 Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- Ahora los titeres surcoreanos estan tergiversando los hechos historicos vinculados con la pasada guerra coreana (25 de junio de 1950-27 de julio de 1953) provocada por EE.UU.
					 En una reunion de secretarios superiores de Chongwadae, convocada el dia 17, Park Geun-hye dijo que segun el resultado de la encuesta sobre la concepcion de historia de los jovenes surcoreanos, "casi 70 por ciento dijeron lamentablemente que la pasada guerra coreana fue la agresion al Norte" e insistio en que "el nuevo gobierno debe corregir ese problema intolerable". 
					
					 Esto es otro acto de traicion a la nacion para encubrir la fachada de provocador de guerra coreana y justificar la invasion armada de EE.UU. encaminada a esclavizar al pueblo coreano.
					
					 Al imputar a la parte connacional la responsabilidad de estallido de guerra, los titeres surcoreanos tratan de ocultar su expediente de haber actuado como brigada de choque en la campana belica de las fuerzas extranjeras y justificar su politica dependiente de estas. 
					
					 Hay datos historicos que confirman que la guerra coreana desatada en la decada de los 50 del siglo pasado fue una guerra de agresion contra la RPDC desatada por las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					 El 26 de junio de 1950, MacArthur envio un mensaje al premier japones de aquel entonces Yoshida ordenando el paro temporal de publicacion del organo del Partido Comunista de Japon, Akahata, durante 30 dias desde el 27 de junio. 
					
					 Un periodico de aquel entonces transmitio que "MacArthur dio esa orden con el pretexto de que Zhou Enlai informo el hecho de que el ejercito titere surcoreano de Syngman Rhee invadio ilegalmente a la parte norte del paralelo 38o de Corea". 
					
					 El 28 de junio de 1950, Zhou Enlai, entonces premier y ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular China, hizo publica una declaracion en lo tocante a la otra de Truman fechada 27 de junio.
					
					 En su nota, Zhou senalo que el ataque del gobierno titere de Syngman Rhee contra la RPDC, cometido a instigacion del gobierno norteamericano, fue iniciado por EE.UU. con el fin de preparar el pretexto de agresion a Corea, Vietnam y otros paises y lo califico de otro acto de intervencion del imperialismo norteamericano en los asuntos asiaticos. 
					
					 En aquellos momentos, la situacion politica mundial y las correlaciones internacionales eran desfavorables para la estrategia de hegemonia mundial de EE.UU. 
					
					 Se aumentaba la influencia de los paises socialistas en la palestra internacional y se activaba la lucha antiimperialista por la emancipacion nacional en muchos paises que estaban bajo la dominacion y subyugacion del imperialismo.
					
					 Por otra parte, era imprescindible una guerra de agresion para los complejos industriales y belicos de EE.UU. y la situacion financiera de Wall Street. 
					
					 La economia estadounidense acogio la era dorada por la produccion y venta de armamentos en la segunda guerra mundial, pero entro en la depresion desde 1946. 
					
					 Se inicio el aumento de gastos militares nunca visto en la historia de EE.UU. y lo azoto la crisis economica. Las autoridades politicas y militares norteamericanas buscaron la solucion en la guerra coreana. 
					
					 Esta opcion fomento el renacimiento de Japon.
					
					 A principios de 1950, el monto de inversiones norteamericanas en Japon ascendio a 2 mil 500 millones de US$. 
					
					 Los provocadores norteamericanos de guerra coreana planeaban utilizar a Japon como trampolin estrategico militar en el Extremo Oriente mientras que los gobernantes japoneses depositaban esperanza en esa contienda belica con el calculo de llevar a efecto sus planes de venganza. 
					
					 5 dias antes de la provocacion de guerra coreana, un corresponsal del periodico suizo en el Extremo Oriente transmitio asi:
					
					 "En el Sur de Corea hay mucha gente que busca la salida de la crisis economica en la invasion armada contra el Norte de Corea. 
					
					 100 mil uniformados entrenados por los estadounidenses y 50 mil policias del Sur de Corea superan el numero de militares norcoreanos".
					
					 Tales hechos no pasan de ser una infima parte de los datos que revelan el objetivo de provocacion de la pasada guerra coreana. 
					
					 La historia no se cambia aunque lo quiera alguien.  
					
					 El criminal pagara su fechoria tarde o temprano.

articles.title: ACNC comenta violacion de DDHH por organo oficial de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ACNC comenta violacion de DDHH por organo oficial de EE.UU.
 Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, se conocio que la Agencia de Seguridad Nacional (ASN) de Estados Unidos vino cometiendo flagrantemente los derechos humanos de sus ciudadanos, lo cual depara fuertes criticas dentro y fuera de ese pais.
					 Ex empleado de la ASN, Edward Snowden, publico el dia 6 en el periodico britanico Guardian un articulo revelador de los hechos de violacion de DDHH por esa entidad que recogio en grandes cantidades los datos de conversaciones telefonicas y del uso de Internet.
					
					 Como prueba material, el articulista presento una nota de orden emitida por un tribunal norteamericano, en la cual se exigia registrar todas las llamadas en el interior del pais y las de telefonia internacional y entregar cada dia el registro al Consejo de Seguridad Nacional.
					
					 Segun esa orden, desde abril pasado hasta la fecha, fueron recogidos los textos de e-mail y llamadas telefonicas de millones de norteamericanos.
					
					 Con anterioridad, Xinhua transmitio que la ASN recoge cada dia mil 700 millones de datos sobre los usuarios de telefono e Internet, entre las cuales hay el intercambio de informaciones privadas entre los familiares.
					
					 Esto es otra prueba que muestra la figura de EE.UU. como Estado criminal donde esta organizada y legalizada la violacion de DDHH.
					
					 Ese hecho hace recordar que el Congreso Nacional de EE.UU. aprobo una ley que otorga al gobierno el derecho a intervenir en cuestiones privadas de los habitantes utilizando los aparatos de interceptacion y los medios de comunicaciones electronicas.
					
					 Hasta ahora se revelaron incontables casos  de interceptacion de comunicaciones personales en EE.UU.
					
					 Por ejemplo, el Departamento de Justicia recogio en secreto los registros de llamadas de AP y las autoridades de asuntos tributarios investigaron y vigilaron de la misma manera a las personas definidas como blancos.
					
					 Causa consternacion la actitud cinica de los altos funcionarios norteamericanos sobre el respecto. 
					
					 A la pregunta sobre el crimen anti-DDHH de la ASN, el presidente norteamericano Obama dijo publicamente el pasado dia 7 a los periodistas que "eso fue aprobado por el Congreso y contribuye a la prevencion de actos terroristas". 
					
					 Un alto funcionario relacionado con el Consejo de Seguridad Nacional tambien disparateo que la recogida de comunicaciones es un "importante medio para proteger el pais desde la amenaza de terroristas". 
					
					 Los hechos demuestran claramente la naturaleza cinica de EE.UU. que justifica y politiza abiertamente la violacion de derechos humanos bajo el rotulo de "antiterrorismo". 
					
					 El mundo califica la "guerra antiterrorista" de EE.UU. de un crimen de lesa humanidad nunca tolerable que pisotea indiscriminadamente la soberania de otros paises y naciones para defender la seguridad y los intereses de la clase privilegiada que representa un por ciento. 
					
					 Asi es la sociedad norteamericana. 
					
					 EE.UU. es el pais reaccionario y enemigo de la humanidad que toma la violacion de derechos humanos de las masas populares como un medio para asegurar los intereses de la capa privilegiada y realizar la ambicion de agresion.
